title: Google Play Store listings on mobile now show required ‘Android OS’ version
content:
After widely rolling out iOS-style install indicators on the homescreen, Google now specifies what version of “Android OS” is required to install an app on the Play Store.

more…

The post Google Play Store listings on mobile now show required ‘Android OS’ version  appeared first on 9to5Google.
